data.meanings: he walked or went along, to strive/exert/labour/work, go quickly, effort, endeavour, hasten/act/run, be active, diligent, age of running or work and assist (child).
data.sentence: The word سَعْيَكُمْ comes from the root س ع ي and is associated with the meanings: he walked or went along, to strive/exert/labour/work, go quickly, effort, endeavour, hasten/act/run, be active, diligent, age of running or work and assist (child).

data.meanings: to separate, be scattered, be dispersed, be various, be divided, be diversed.
data.sentence: The word لَشَتَّى comes from the root ش ت ت and is associated with the meanings: to separate, be scattered, be dispersed, be various, be divided, be diversed.
